author: Robert Hess
description: Bone dry and boozy, this cocktail is aimed at those who have a penchant for both sherry and aquavit, not to mention bittersweet artichoke liqueurs - hardly mass market then. Nor are Aston Martin cars but I want one.Be warned - use the wrong sherry and this drink falls apart - donâ€™t be tempted to sub manzanilla with a fino.
name: Trident
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
